pre.title: What Problems Customers Solve Most Often
pre.p1: Production technology with industrial exhausts — air flowing through the duct carries dirt particles to outlet filters, RTO technology, etc. Dirt settles in the ductwork and dirty ducts cause problems in the production process.
pre.p2: Production technology with clean outdoor air supply — the air contains dust particles that settle in the ductwork and, over time, can start causing issues in the production line.

needs.title: Customer Needs From Industrial Production
items: The production technology is not working properly because the exhaust or the air supply to the technology is clogged.
The Fire Authority requires fire safety and part of the measure is to clean the exhaust from the technology and/or the air-handling system.
Quality requires high standards in production to ensure and declare quality to customers; this usually includes regular cleaning of exhaust and supply air in production.
Existing cleaning procedures are no longer suitable due to changes in legislation, increased quality requirements, etc.
Cleaning of part of the technology is required without shutting down the entire system, or downtime needs to be reduced.

coop.title: How the Cooperation With JettyRobot Works
items: We provide an initial inspection of the piping (visual inspection or another method).
We suggest the most effective cleaning method. In industrial production, we usually choose one of the non-abrasive methods; other methods on request.
We implement cleaning within the time and scope agreed by the customer.
We provide our customers with a report of the cleaning performed.
